definition: to wish for/to desire/variant of 慾|欲[yu4]
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: The character of this asceticism is determined by its motive.
sentences.chinese: 的性质，这禁欲主义是取决于它的动机。

sentences.english: Between asceticism and indulgence men and races swing.
sentences.chinese: 人们及各种族总是在禁欲主义和放荡形骸之间徘徊。

sentences.english: I know the pleasures of asceticism, and the sense of power it gives.
sentences.chinese: 我知道禁欲主义的快乐，以及它所赋予的力量感。

sentences.english: This is basically some form of asceticism, the control of the body.
sentences.chinese: 可以说是某种禁欲主义，克制肉体。

sentences.english: The early settlers believed in Calvinist restraint.
sentences.chinese: 早期的美国移民是卡尔文式禁欲主义的信民。

sentences.english: I should have known that monks practice asceticism.
sentences.chinese: 我应该知道和尚奉行禁欲主义，还好他没有生气。

sentences.english: I should have known that monks practice asceticism . But he wasn't offended.
sentences.chinese: 我应该知道和尚奉行禁欲主义，还好他没有生气。

sentences.english: It inculcated universal asceticism and social levelling in its crudest form.
sentences.chinese: 这种文献倡导普遍的禁欲主义和粗陋的平均主义。

sentences.english: The pro-condom versus pro-abstinence argument is a good example of that.
sentences.chinese: 赞成避孕套与赞成禁欲主义的争论便是很好的例子。

sentences.english: Any discussion of pre-Christian asceticism is outside the scope of this article.
sentences.chinese: 任何讨论前基督教禁欲主义是范围以外的这篇文章。
